English: three-dimensional road junction (i.e. involving flyover bridges or underpass tunnels)

d.f: `道路~`或~`鐵路~`各自~`或~`相互~`交叉~`時~，`利用~`高架橋~`或~`地道~`使~`不同~`來~`向~`的~`車輛~`能~`各自~`從~`不同~`的~`路線~`穿~`叉~`而~`過~。`常見~`有~`二~`層~`或~`多~`層~`的~`設置~。`有~`節省~`時間~，`維持~`交通~`順暢~`等~`之~`便~。

English: three-dimensional road junction (i.e. involving flyover bridges or underpass tunnels)
